content: कोशः, --शं (षः, --षं) [कुश्(ष्) आधारादौ घञ् कर्तरि अच् वा <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A vessel for holding liquids, a pail. {@--2@} A bucket, cup. {@--3@} A vessel in general. {@--4@} A box, cupboard, drawer, trunk. {@--5@} A sheath, scabbard. {@--6@} A case, cover, covering. {@--7@} A store, mass; <ls>Ms. 1. 99.</ls> {@--8@} A store-room. {@--9@} A treasury, an apartment where money is kept; <ls>Ms. 8. 419.</ls> {@--10@} Treasure, money, wealth; निःशेषविश्राणितकोषजातं <ls>R. 5. 1</ls>; (<ab>fig.</ab> also); कोशस्तपसः <ls>K. 45.</ls> {@--11@} Gold or silver wrought or unwrought. {@--12@} A dictionary, lexicon, vocabulary. {@--13@} A closed flower, bud; सुजातयोः पंकजकोशयोः श्रियं <ls>R. 3. 8</ls>, <ls n="R.">13. 29</ls>; इत्थं विचिंतयति कोशगते द्विरेफे हा हंत हंत नलिनीं गज उज्जहार <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--14@} The stone of a fruit. {@--15@} A pod. {@--16@} A nut-meg, nut-shell. {@--17@} The cocoon of a silkworm; <ls>Y. 3. 147.</ls> {@--18@} Vulva, the womb. {@--19@} An egg. {@--20@} A testicle or the scrotum. {@--21@} The penis. {@--22@} A ball, globe. {@--23@} (In Vedānta <ab>phil.</ab>) A term for the five vestures (sheaths or cases) which successively make the body, enshrining the soul. {@--24@} (In law) A kind of ordeal; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Y. 2. 112.</ls> {@--25@} A house. {@--26@} A cloud. {@--27@} The interior of a carriage. {@--28@} A kind of bandage or ligature (in surgery). {@--29@} An oath. --शी (षी) {@--1@} A bud. {@--2@} A seed-vessel. {@--3@} The beard of corn. {@--4@} A shoe, sandal (पादुका).

कोशः, --शं (षः, --षं) [कुश्(ष्) आधारादौ घञ् कर्तरि अच् वा <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A vessel for holding liquids, a pail. {@--2@} A bucket, cup. {@--3@} A vessel in general. {@--4@} A box, cupboard, drawer, trunk. {@--5@} A sheath, scabbard. {@--6@} A case, cover, covering. {@--7@} A store, mass; <ls>Ms. 1. 99.</ls> {@--8@} A store-room. {@--9@} A treasury, an apartment where money is kept; <ls>Ms. 8. 419.</ls> {@--10@} Treasure, money, wealth; निःशेषविश्राणितकोषजातं <ls>R. 5. 1</ls>; (<ab>fig.</ab> also); कोशस्तपसः <ls>K. 45.</ls> {@--11@} Gold or silver wrought or unwrought. {@--12@} A dictionary, lexicon, vocabulary. {@--13@} A closed flower, bud; सुजातयोः पंकजकोशयोः श्रियं <ls>R. 3. 8</ls>, <ls n="R.">13. 29</ls>; इत्थं विचिंतयति कोशगते द्विरेफे हा हंत हंत नलिनीं गज उज्जहार <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--14@} The stone of a fruit. {@--15@} A pod. {@--16@} A nut-meg, nut-shell. {@--17@} The cocoon of a silkworm; <ls>Y. 3. 147.</ls> {@--18@} Vulva, the womb. {@--19@} An egg. {@--20@} A testicle or the scrotum. {@--21@} The penis. {@--22@} A ball, globe. {@--23@} (In Vedānta <ab>phil.</ab>) A term for the five vestures (sheaths or cases) which successively make the body, enshrining the soul. {@--24@} (In law) A kind of ordeal; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Y. 2. 112.</ls> {@--25@} A house. {@--26@} A cloud. {@--27@} The interior of a carriage. {@--28@} A kind of bandage or ligature (in surgery). {@--29@} An oath. --शी (षी) {@--1@} A bud. {@--2@} A seed-vessel. {@--3@} The beard of corn. {@--4@} A shoe, sandal (पादुका).
